Room.Name: Ministry Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Ministry Way, east of Miriam's Repair Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Miriam is one of the finest blacksmiths in the town, but limits his work to just repairing armor, claiming that more people are willing to fix their armors instead of buying new stuff. On the east side of the road are the three North Oceancrest Ministries.
